ing: 1 (16 ounce) jar mayonnaise (such as Hellmann'sÂ®/Best FoodsÂ®)
1 (4 ounce) package crumbled blue cheese, or more to taste
1/8 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste
des: "This family recipe comes from a small town restaurant owner who was known for his sauces/dressings. I made a few tweaks. It's amazing!"
ins: Combine mayonnaise, sour cream, milk, blue cheese, hot sauce, horseradish, and garlic powder in a bowl. Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours to let flavors blend.
